text: Misoli kasone, ki iTavrot ʙa onho (jahudiho) ʙor şud, sipas onro ʙarnadoştand, (ja'ne ʙa on amal nakardand), misli on xar ast, ki kitoʙhoero ʙar puşt ʙor mekunad va namedonad dar on cist. Ci ʙad misolest, misoli mardume, ki ojoti Allohro durūƣ şumurdand va az on manfi'at naʙurdand. Va Alloh sitamkoronero, ki az hududi muqarrar kardai Alloh ʙerun meravand, hidojat namekunad
